sentences.english: As a result, childhood migraines are often dismissed as sinus headaches.
sentences.chinese: 因此，小孩的偏頭痛往往被診斷爲鼻竇炎疼痛。

sentences.english: That, he says, will be the next big advance in sinus treatment.
sentences.chinese: 他說，這將會是未來治療鼻竇炎的巨大的進步。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the CT diagnostic value and CT findings of fungal sinusitis .
sentences.chinese: 目的探討黴菌性鼻竇炎CT特徵性表現及診斷價值。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the representation and value of CT examination of mycosis of sinus.
sentences.chinese: 探討黴菌性鼻竇炎的CT表現和價值。

sentences.english: Sufferred from very serious nose sinusitis nose to you can greaten ceaselessly ?
sentences.chinese: 患了很嚴重的鼻竇炎鼻子就會不斷變大嗎？

sentences.english: I still suffer from catarrh and sinus problems.
sentences.chinese: 我仍然患有黏膜炎和鼻竇炎。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the role of adenoidectomy in the treatment of pediatric chronic rhinosinusitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討腺樣體切除術對兒童慢性鼻竇炎轉歸的影響。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effect of microwave for adenoidectomy on chronic rhinosinusitis in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討微波切除腺樣體治療兒童慢性鼻竇炎的療效。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate CT features and diagnostic value of fungus infection of paranasal sinuses.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討真菌性鼻竇炎的CT特徵性表現及診斷價值。

sentences.english: As for chronic sinusitis, Moxifloxacin or Cefepime is the first choice.
sentences.chinese: 慢性鼻竇炎治療首選莫西沙星或頭孢吡肟。

sentences.english: Objective To review the diagnosis and treatment for fungus ball nasosinusitis .
sentences.chinese: 目的總結真菌球型鼻竇炎的診斷方法和治療效果。

sentences.english: The existing rule sinusitis and inferior turbinate hypertrophy disease.
sentences.chinese: 現有治鼻竇炎和下鼻甲肥厚症。

sentences.english: Conclusions Sinusitis and nasopharyngitis may complicate chronic cough among children.
sentences.chinese: 結論對兒童慢性咳嗽應注意鼻竇炎鼻咽炎的伴發。

sentences.english: Objective To study the CT features of fungal infection paranasal sinusitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討黴菌性副鼻竇炎的CT特徵。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss diagnosis and treatment of fungal sinusitis .
sentences.chinese: 目的探討黴菌性鼻竇炎的診斷與治療方法。

sentences.english: Objective: To investigate the correlation of the nasal sinusitis with nasal septum deviation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討鼻中隔偏曲與慢性鼻竇炎的相關性。

pinyin: feng1 shi1 xing4 guan1 jie2 yan2
you1 men2 luo2 xuan2 gan3 jun1

definition: (TCM) plum-pit qi, a feeling of a lump in the throat (globus pharyngis) or of stagnant phlegm
